description:
In an abstracted 1346AD, the Black Plague has rendered the world bleak and grey. Immerse yourself in a journey of sound and colour as you travel its environs, complete simple puzzles, and gradually return life to a desolate landscape.

Having sound ON is essential to enjoying the full experience of this game! Full screen mode is recommended.

//

B. Cleo is a game designer in training at Media Design School, New Zealand. She has a passion for emotional storytelling in games and open-world adventures. If you'd like to get in touch, you can email: bryarrenshaw@gmail.com

//
